description.value:
Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Close (25 ft. + 5ft./2 levels)
Target: One or more allies
Duration: Four rounds

Description

Your allies are used to your schemes, and roll with whatever you come up with. Select a number of allies up to your initiation modifier within range. You may treat those allies as having two teamwork feats you possess. If you are targeted by this boost and have this maneuver readied, you may expend it as a free action, even if it isn't your turn, to actually gain the teamwork feats for the duration of the boost, allowing you to use them yourself.
